subject: p16508811
History: Year old man h/o renal transplant with chronic non healing L foot ulcers, osteomyelitis, LLL Pneumonia, interval change in pneumonia.
Impression: As compared to, bilateral lower lobe predominant airspace opacities have worsened, and may reflect evolving infectious pneumonia. Peripheral interstitial opacities likely reflect coexisting interstitial edema. Small left pleural effusion has increased in size, and a small right pleural effusion is new.
